title: Battleship Puzzle
won: Congratulations! You found all the ships!

rules.title: Rules
rules.goal: Find all ships in the grid using the numbers as clues.
rules.numbers: Numbers show how many ship segments are in each row and column.
rules.ships: The fleet consists of: 1 battleship (4), 2 cruisers (3), 3 destroyers (2), 4 submarines (1).
rules.noTouch: Ships cannot touch each other - not even diagonally!
rules.howTo: Tap a cell to mark it. Use the buttons to switch between ship and water.
rules.tip: Start with rows/columns that have 0 (all water) or high numbers.
